titleStmt.title: Speech of the right reverend father in God, Anthony Lord Bishop of Meath, when the clergy waited on His Majesty at his camp nigh Dublin, July 7, 1690 : together with His Majesty's most gracious answer.
titleStmt.author: Dopping, Anthony, 1643-1697.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for B. Took, and sold by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Chetham's Library.
